patternSteps.1: Ready Posture: Closed Ready Stance A
patternSteps.2: Step 1. Move the left foot to B forming a right L-stance toward B while executing a twin forearm block.
patternSteps.3: Step 2. Execute a high inward strike to B with the right knife-hand while bringing the left side fist in front of the right shoulder, maintaining a right L-stance toward B.
patternSteps.4: Step 3. Execute a middle punch to B with the left fist while forming a left fixed stance toward B, slipping the left foot to B.
patternSteps.5: Step 4. Bring the left foot to the right footand then move the right foot to A, forming a left L-stance toward A while executing a twin forearm block.
patternSteps.6: Step 5. Execute a high inward strike to A with the left knife-hand while bringing the right side fist in front of the left shoulder, maintaining a left L-stance toward A.
patternSteps.7: Step 6. Execute a middle punch to A with the right fist while forming a right fixed stance toward A, slipping the right foot to A.
patternSteps.8: Step 7. Bring the right foot to the left foot and then turn the face toward D while forming a right bending ready stance A toward D.
patternSteps.9: Step 8. Execute a middle side piercing kick to D with the left foot.
patternSteps.10: Step 9. Lower the left foot to D forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.11: Step 10. Move the right foot to D forming a left L-stance toward D while executing a guarding block to D with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.12: Step 11. Move the left foot to D forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.13: Step 12. Move the right foot to D forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a middle thrust to D with the right straight finger tip.
patternSteps.14: Step 13. Move the left foot to E turning counter clockwise to form a right L-stance toward E, at the same time executing a twin forearm block.
patternSteps.15: Step 14. Execute a high inward strike to E with the right knife-hand while bringing the left side fist in front of the right shoulder, maintaining a right L-stance toward E.
patternSteps.16: Step 15. Execute a middle punch to E with the left fist while forming a left fixed stance toward E, slipping the left foot to E.
patternSteps.17: Step 16. Bring the left foot to the right foot and then move the right foot to F, forming a left L-stance toward F while executing a twin forearm block.
patternSteps.18: Step 17. Execute a high inward strike to F with the left knife-hand while bringing the right side fist in front of the left shoulder, maintaining a left L-stance toward F.
patternSteps.19: Step 18. Execute a middle punch to F with the right fist while forming a right fixed stance toward F, slipping the right foot to F.
patternSteps.20: Step 19. Bring the right foot to the left foot and then move the left foot to C forming a left walkng stance toward C while executing a circular block to CF with the right inner forearm.
patternSteps.21: Step 20. Execute a low front snap kick to C with the right foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 19.
patternSteps.22: Step 21. Lower the right foot to C forming a right walking stance toward C while executing a middle punch to C with the left fist.
patternSteps.23: Step 22. Execute a circular block to CE with the left inner forearm while maintaining a right walking stance toward C.
patternSteps.24: Step 23. Execute a low front snap kick to C with the left foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 22.
patternSteps.25: Step 24. Lower the left foot to C forming a left walking stance toward C while executing a middle punch to C with the right fist.
patternSteps.26: Step 25. Turn the face toward C forming a left bending ready stance A toward C.
patternSteps.27: Step 26. Execute a middle side piercing kick to C with the right foot.
patternSteps.28: Step 27. Lower the right foot on line CD and then move the left foot to B, turning counter clockwise to form a right L-stance toward B, at the same time executing a middle guarding block to B with the forearm.
patternSteps.29: Step 28. Bring the left foot to the right foot and then move the right foot to A forming a left L-stance toward A while executing a middle guarding clock to A with the forearm.
patternSteps.30: End: Bring the foot back to a ready position.
